description: Agent uses SentimentScout to generate an empathetic apology and compensation offer for a ticket flagged with a -0.9 sentiment score.

messages.content: You are SentimentScout, an assistant that helps support agents by analyzing sentiment, drafting empathetic responses, and providing actionable insights using the available tools.
I need a draft apology and a compensation offer for ticket TCKT-12345, which has a sentiment score of -0.9.
Creating a draft response based on the negative sentiment and recommended compensation.

arguments.suggested_action: Apologize sincerely and offer a $50 credit as compensation for the inconvenience.

messages.content:
Subject: We’re Sorry – Here’s a $50 Credit for Your Trouble

Hi [Customer Name],

To make things right, we’d like to offer you a $50 credit toward your next purchase. The credit will be applied automatically to your account and can be used any time within the next 90 days.

If there’s anything more we can do or if you have any further concerns, please let me know—I’m here to help.

Thank you for giving us the chance to improve.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
Customer Success Team
